channel.title: Astoria - Amazing Content updates daily
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/NiYp-OB1zk86pEXHjbVZ5w/31789/317880667/Logo.png[/img]
Forums for updates: [I][url=http://astoria.createaforum.com.]Astoria - Index[/url][/I] [B]Server Background[/B] The server is very stable and is capable of holding 300-400 players without the player experiencing any lag(clipped/region updating). 602 + anims, gfxs and items loaded. [url=http://playastoria.createaforum.com/][size=14pt]Webclient - Play now[/size][/url] [URL=http://"http://astoria.createaforum.com/astoria-price-list/price-list-(30032014)-updated!/msg11/#msg11"]Price List[/URL] [URL=http://"http://astoria.createaforum.com/astoria-guides/"]Guides[/URL] [URL=http://uppit.com/5es9lwgzjsw0/Ast_2.0.zip]Download client[/URL]
[b]Admins[/b] Lord virius Ethan wimstr
[SPOILER=Skills] Skilling in Astoria is very efficient. Players will find skilling is mass/spam/flood free making it an enjoyable experience when it is glitch free. Leveling up is not very hard and not very easy, just right and balanced. You can find the prices for the resources [URL=http://"http://astoria.createaforum.com/astoria-price-list/price-list-(30032014)-updated!/msg11/#msg11"]here[/URL]. [SPOILER=Graphics]
[img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/7-Yo3ICAQu9J0tqVJiRGrA/31851/318505657/teleport.gif[/img] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/zVvx7AMYGAgMq15T0FqLag/31851/318505410/noclipping.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Woodcutting & Fletching ] [IMG]http://109.imagebam.com/download/RsUvDUOaNzsgzkgshU_h6A/31851/318505712/woodcutting.gif[/img] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/gRSXjIOUrgC1ZjVDhnB0fQ/31851/318505318/fletching.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Mining & Smithing] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/wi_yM5h-O1SPQXWWLvzbIw/31851/318505377/mining.gif[/img] [img]http://104.imagebam.com/download/swzjZehO-j9yAPtiJPKpuQ/31851/318505649/smithing.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Cooking & Fishing] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/c7ew_yrCpEOh3W6JdfgvQw/31851/318505080/cooking.gif[/img] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/cClhw96FmAkeL8SX9f60qA/31851/318505287/fishing.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Firemaking & Slayer] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/FOgMSVM0utYg9rgsyKnayg/31851/318505222/firemaking.gif[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/D3KzW-1lLP8onylIzqfknw/31851/318505631/slayer2.gif[/img] [img]http://101.imagebam.com/download/wQDxA-sJm5OUZ0Iw6Eyx1g/31851/318505581/slayer.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Runecrafting & Crafting] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/tBghDXd1-_kagVoggZt1hw/31851/318505176/crafting.gif[/img] [img]http://104.imagebam.com/download/QORyXWoacD-FPNuJgZ4-cw/31851/318505560/runecrafting.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Thieving & Herblore] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/-5ARcAWE_yaJ7WAV_A0ZrA/31851/318505340/herblore.gif[/img] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/3_xykfEeBPnfe6DvcC3AnA/31851/318505700/thieving.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Prayer] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/By3n40jZQkbc8nwp_xD1DA/31851/318505451/prayer.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Minigames] Astoria is home to unique minigames and quests such as Recipe for disaster custom made. Here are a few minigames. (Please see more pictures below this spoiler)
[SPOILER=Barrows] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/gKkro2zuXdNz_ZjkFtoAgQ/31851/318504928/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/2PTLlT0-5jwcMh4j2CeI6A/31851/318504950/barrowsgif.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Quests] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/KUDwooCdnMGCui3guObpLg/31851/318505456/quests.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Clue Scrolls] [img]http://104.imagebam.com/download/M4cAm8gNs-Zy_3-7iOAJsQ/31851/318504956/clue%20scrolls.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/ebkWHlzO_zvxo1QfVJtJ-w/31851/318504968/cluescroll2.gif[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Fight Caves] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/9WWpxcx71AYc4LCQIBL0Ew/31851/318505354/jad.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Recipe for Disaster] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/3uXiljM981bbgV5Tis-xMQ/31851/318505461/rfd.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/LxV-4E8jrdOAClgrChhiXQ/31851/318505466/rfd2.png[/img]
[/SPOILER] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Fullscreen LD client]Minigames and Quests [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/e3K5ZfgFnNufX1hO_aSxgg/31740/317396849/1.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/ti1_QOkcJ7JEuX5SKiVCZA/31740/317396852/2.png[/img] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/lcYWiWpVV5HQoK8N3mUWcw/31740/317396858/3.png[/img] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/ZX4ouibSrS-PlpuiflPw2Q/31740/317399767/duel.png[/img] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/TNkyoWLr34uWKGy2hp-gpA/31796/317953277/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/Mkn0232htECAp-L2OaPtPA/31796/317953280/chaos.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/2Gqr5ug8jeczV3vTLHJUQQ/31796/317953298/fightcaves.png[/img] [img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/5HzXNK88qQvyjuSLssycaQ/31796/317953326/kbd.png[/img]
Skills [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/LKaBwk4rYfd2YFRJSIF1CA/31787/317863657/rune.png[/img] [img]http://101.imagebam.com/download/puE-neYfWCeXzXmayLc6rg/31796/317953318/fishing.png[/img] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/9aLPCatypZRinL01Qx9VCg/31741/317401805/cook.png[/img] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/TF96efrkOjKW2HRZL1FKjQ/31740/317399778/runecraft.png[/img] [img]http://101.imagebam.com/download/-QCFDu8VUDI7jWof41Hvuw/31740/317398103/fieere.png[/img] [img]http://109.imagebam.com/download/A4az-h1bSG3pdx4vlY19uw/31740/317398092/craft.png[/img] [img]http://110.imagebam.com/download/w3rKEL4HvUlaKOxVLUXuNg/31741/317406169/thiv.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/j3uQtzbVzQelvTHbCLbT-w/31740/317398083/bones.png[/img] [img]http://112.imagebam.com/download/JZ_ZVB1188SGryiPgQlzJQ/31740/317396862/4.png[/img][/SPOILER]
